titles.title: State Regulatory Representation Clarification Act of 2014
A bill to clarify membership requirements for the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation.
State Regulatory Representation Clarification Act of 2014

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: State Regulatory Representation Clarification Act of 2014 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to require that one of the presidential appointees to the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) once served as a state bank supervisor.
